name: WhirlpoolConnectedAppliances
0:
”Alexa, microwave for 3 minutes”
”Alexa, tell Whirlpool to start the washing machine.”
”Alexa, ask Whirlpool to preheat the oven.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: whirlpool
des:
The Whirlpool Connected Appliances skill makes it easy to interact with, control, and monitor your Whirlpool connected appliances using Amazon Alexa. As long as you have a registered Whirlpool connected appliance, you can enable this skill and link your Whirlpool account to Amazon Alexa for simple, seamless voice interaction.
You can use Alexa to make your life easier, by simplifying acts of care like laundry and cooking. No need to lift a finger- just ask Alexa!

Try saying:
Washer
Alexa, tell Whirlpool to pause the washer.
Alexa, ask Whirlpool how much time is left on the washing machine.

Dryer
Alexa, tell Whirlpool to turn on the dryer.
Alexa, tell Whirlpool to turn on dryer Wrinkle Shield.
Alexa, ask Whirlpool for time remaining on the dryer.

All-In-One (Washer/Dryer Combo)
Alexa, tell Whirlpool to start the all-in-one.
Alexa, ask Whirlpool how much time is left on the all-in-one machine.

Microwave
Alexa, microwave for 3 minutes
Alexa, turn on the hood light.
Alexa, turn the hood fan on.
Alexa, cook popcorn in the microwave.
Alexa, defrost for 12 minutes.
 * times shown are examples. 

Oven
Alexa, ask Whirlpool to preheat the oven.
Alexa, ask Whirlpool to set 20 minutes on the oven timer.
Alexa, ask Whirlpool how much time's left on the oven.

Supported oven cook modes are:
preheat, bake, convect bake, convect roast, keep warm

Dishwasher
Alexa, tell Whirlpool to start the dishwasher.
Alexa, ask Whirlpool for time remaining on the dishwasher.

Amazon Alexa works with select Whirlpool smart appliances. For additional information, support, help linking your accounts together, visit https://www.whirlpool.com/home-innovations/connected-appliances.html
Please refer to your appliance’s included Use and Care guide for specific details on Remote Start safe operation and usage which impacts various Alexa features. 

Supported Models:
Ovens

WEE750H0 WEEA25H0 WEG750H0 WEGA25H0 WEEA50H0
